entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Tofino
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:04 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING ENDED, Tofino
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: A few showers. High 6.
entry.summary: Rain showers. Ice pellets and freezing rain early this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except 50 gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections this morning. High 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 50 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections overnight. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near 9.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 50 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Windy. Low 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.summary: Rain. High 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
